resources.string:
What\'s new with Field Nation

Our redesign of the work order details is now complete including improvements to our upload process. Each upload will auto-retry up to 5 times. If it is still unsuccessful, you have the option to retry from the push notification.

What we added:
  • More information on our file upload push notifications
  • Auto-retry feature for file uploads
  • \'Retry all\' action to failed file upload push notification
  • Support for tablets without phone capabilities
  • Provider qualifications information
What we changed:
  • App will now open on the last list you were looking at
  • Work order list remembers your last position when browsing
  • Updated the look and feel of various dialogs and work order detail sections
  • Replaced \'Unauthorized\' error message with an informational dialog
  • Updated our feedback form to display multiple lines
Bugs we fixed:
  • Error messages not triggering for unauthorized users
  • Upload dialogs using excessive memory
  • Contact list not displaying when trying to access from work order list
  • Uploads not honoring the \'upload with wifi\' setting
